Tucson Prime had all he could take of the insects.  He sensed something was=
 terribly wrong and that Rodimus was in danger.  And it wasn't by the Decep=
ticons or Predacons.  A new enemy. It was all he needed.  But this time he =
was not going to put up with scrap.  It was the one thing that separated hi=
m from Optimus Prime.  His temper was slightly shorter than his mentor's.  =
His power levels spike quickly due to his change in temper.

" That's where=
 you're wrong.  I haven't come to feed anyone!  I'VE COME TO RECOVER MY COM=
RADE AND I WILL NOT LET YOU STAND IN MY WAY!"

He fires off one of the blas=
t cannons in a fit of anger.  Whether or not it would hit his target was co=
mpletely unknown.  He was dangerous when angry.  Straight Shot, whenever sh=
e traveled with him would be sure not to push any of his buttons the wrong =
way.  She could now sense that her brother was having one of those bad mood=
 fits.

"Uhh ohh, he's in that mood again...  Perceptor, guys, if I were yo=
u I'd shield your audio sensors.  You - don't wanna be too close when he bl=
ows a fuse."

Quickstride nodds as he covers his ears.

" I remembered the =
last time he blew a fuse. She's right, you don't wanna be anywhere near him=
 when he's angry."
